quality_assessment: Excellent comprehensive coverage of common error messages. All documented errors match implementation. Clear explanations with actionable solutions. Good organization and cross-references.

issues.description: Consider adding a table of contents or quick reference at the top for easier navigation
issues.fix_suggestion: Add a brief TOC listing all error messages at the start of the document for quick scanning

positive_aspects: Comprehensive coverage of all major error messages across the system
Each error includes full message, meaning, causes, and solutions
Accurate error messages match implementation (verified against src/)
Good use of code examples to illustrate solutions
Cross-references to detailed documentation (e.g., Spec 140 for concurrent resume)
Platform-specific troubleshooting included (e.g., process checks for stale locks)
Covers workflow composition errors with examples
Good balance of technical accuracy and accessibility
Solutions are actionable and specific with command examples
Includes both common and advanced error scenarios
References to source code for Template and parameter errors
Includes examples for complex errors like circular dependencies
improvement_suggestions: Consider adding a quick reference table at the top listing all errors and their severity/category
Could add 'Related Errors' sections to connect similar issues
Consider adding error code numbers if the system uses them (ErrorCode enum exists)
Could benefit from a 'Most Common' section highlighting the top 5 errors users encounter

metadata.validation_focus: Check common error messages documentation matches implementation
errors_verified: command not found: claude - documented correctly
verification_notes: All error message formats verified against source code
Resume lock behavior matches Spec 140 implementation
Template and composition errors match composer_integration.rs error types
Timeout messages match subprocess and execution error handling
No broken internal links found in this subsection
Cross-references to CLAUDE.md Spec 140 are appropriate
Solutions reference correct file paths and commands
